message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.NE 

This paper is about Semantic Textual Similarity (STS) measures and their applications, which are related to natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning (ML). Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which covers NLP and ML for text processing. Additionally, the paper discusses various methods and techniques for STS, which could fall under sub-categories such as cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.LG (Machine Learning), and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). The paper also mentions applications such as semantic search and information retrieval, which could be relevant to cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
